document.full_text: one man died and another was critically injured after both fell out of the window of a moving tour bus in massachusetts, the third fatal bus accident in the northeast in less than a month, authorities said on sunday.
document.title: third fatal northeast bus accident in less than a month
lines_and_colors: one man died and another was critically injured after both fell out of the window of a moving tour bus in massachusetts, the third fatal bus accident in the northeast in less than a month, authorities said on sunday.
